# pysarpro: SAR processing in Python

[![Image.sc forum](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json.svg?label=forum&url=https%3A%2F%2Fforum.image.sc%2Ftags%2Fscikit-image.json&query=%24.topic_list.tags.0.topic_count&colorB=brightgreen&suffix=%20topics&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://forum.image.sc/tags/pysarpro)
[![Stackoverflow](https://img.shields.io/badge/stackoverflow-Ask%20questions-blue.svg)](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/pysarpro)
[![project chat](https://img.shields.io/badge/zulip-join_chat-brightgreen.svg)](https://pysarpro.zulipchat.com)

- **Website (including documentation):** [https://pysarpro.org/](https://pysarpro.org)
- **Documentation:** [https://pysarpro.org/docs/stable/](https://pysarpro.org/docs/stable/)
- **User forum:** [https://forum.image.sc/tag/pysarpro](https://forum.image.sc/tag/pysarpro)
- **Developer forum:** [https://discuss.scientific-python.org/c/contributor/pysarpro](https://discuss.scientific-python.org/c/contributor/pysarpro)
- **Source:** [https://github.com/pysarpro/pysarpro](https://github.com/pysarpro/pysarpro)

## Installation

- **pip:** `pip install pysarpro`
- **conda:** `conda install -c conda-forge pysarpro`

Also see [installing](https://github.com/scikit-image/scikit-image/blob/main/INSTALL.rst)`pysarpro`.

If you find this project useful, please cite:

> <https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.99196>
